attributes.action: Understand the role played by volunteers working for charities and the way in which his proposals may impact the voluntary sector
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The other evening as I put my car back in the garage after a round trip of 92 miles on behalf of an internationally renowned charity I realised that if the Prime Minister's proposals went ahead that trip would have cost me around £120.00

I do not receive any contribution to my expenses neither do I seek any but if that is the sort of cost that I am expected to cover every time I make what is quite an essential trip then I may have to reconsider my commitment.  This when the same Prime Minister tells us that the voluntary sector should be encouraged to do more to help both the disadvantaged and the dispossessed.

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/ForRoadCharging/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
